name: base
description: Scaffolding for a basic Typescript poject
author: Balaganesh Damodaran <asleepysamurai@gmail.com>

scripts.start: yarn build && cd dist && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.js
scripts.start:inspect: yarn build && cd dist && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --inspect -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.js
scripts.start:inspect-brk: yarn build && cd dist && node --experimental-specifier-resolution=node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register ./src/index.js
